page.title: 14FARMING IN LYNEHAM
page.content: MR AND MRS BENNETT HAVE A FARM NEAR TOCKENHAM AND WE WENT TO SEE IT.WE WENT TO SEE THE CALVES IN THE SHED AND WE PLAYED IN THE STRAW. CRISTIAN SMALLBONE 6YRS. ME AND GEORGINA AND LISA AND KEVIN WENT TO MR BENNETT'S FARM AND FIRST WE WENT TO THE MILK PARLOR AND THEN WE WENT TO THE DAIRY. IN THE DAIRY THERE WERE BIG CONTAINERS WITH GALLONS OF MILK. THERE WAS ONE BLIND CALF. WE WENT TO SEE THE HORSES IN THE YARD AND WE SAW TWO HORSES AND ONE OF THE HORSES WAS CALLED MAGIC. WE SAW POTATOES IN THE POTATO SHED AND SOME BLACK AND WHITE COWS IN THE FIELD. MARIE PONTING 6YRS.
